description: Detects persistence method using windows telemetry Author: Lednyov Alexey, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Registry Persistence Mechanism via Windows Telemetry
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\AppCompatFlags\\TelemetryController\\* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Command* AND winlog.event_data.Details:*.exe*) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.Details:(*\\system32\\CompatTelRunner.exe* OR *\\system32\\DeviceCensus.exe*))))
